message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think we can do better than even. I'll take 60, and you can have 40.  This is a fair offer considering the inflation that will hit you harder in the next round.
I'll take 55, you can have 45. I'm still willing to split it fairly, but I'm also aware of the inflation and I need to look out for myself.  Let's end this before it gets worse for me.
